title: Mama Loves the Poyo Poyo Zaurus
original_name: ママはぽよぽよザウルスがお好き
sinopse: The "adventures" of a young mother and father as they deal with the joys and challenges of raising small children. The "poyopoyo" in the title is an onomatopoeia for the young children "toddling" around (or walking unsteadily). (from Wikipedia)
